translations.Desde 1889, somos un pilar de la cultura: Since 1889, we have been a pillar of Italian culture in Miramar. We were born to support immigrants and today we continue to promote the language, traditions and cultural encounter. With 136 years of history, we have evolved while maintaining our Italian heart.

translations.Si necesita alquilar uno de nuestros ele: If you need to rent one of our elegant halls for your event or celebration, contact our team. We offer personalized advice to make your event an unforgettable moment.

translations.Tambi√©n nos puede contactar de Lunes a: You can also contact us from Monday to Friday from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.
translations.Nuestro sal√≥n principal es perfecto par: Our main hall is perfect for large events such as weddings, conferences and galas. With large windows that provide natural light and views of the city.
translations.Un espacio √≠ntimo y elegante ideal para: An intimate and elegant space ideal for medium-sized events such as birthdays, family reunions and corporate meetings.
translations.¬øC√≥mo puedo reservar un sal√≥n?: How can I reserve a hall?
translations.Puede realizar una reserva completando e: You can make a reservation by completing the form on this page, calling us directly or visiting our secretariat. We recommend booking at least 2 months in advance.
translations.Contamos con una lista de proveedores de: We have a list of recommended catering providers, but you can also bring your own service. Ask about our traditional Italian menu options.
translations.¬øQu√© instalaciones y equipamiento incl: What facilities and equipment are included?
translations.Nuestros salones incluyen sistema de son: Our halls include a basic sound system, projector, tables and chairs. For an additional cost you can request special lighting, decoration and advanced audiovisual equipment.

translations.136 a√±os acompa√±ando a la ciudad de Mi: 136 years accompanying the city of Miramar üá¶üá∑üáÆüáπ
translations.Revive momentos clave de nuestra trayect: Relive key moments of our trajectory.
translations.Historia del C√≠rculo Italiano Joven Ita: History of the Italian Circle Joven Italia
translations.nuestros_origenes_p1: The history of the Italian Circle begins in the late 19th century, when groups of Italian immigrants decided to settle in a nascent Miramar. Faced with a lack of medical assistance, on April 28, 1889, these immigrants formed an Italian mutual aid society named "Joven Italia", with Felice Lucini as its first president.
translations.En sus inicios, la sociedad funcionaba m: In its beginnings, the society operated through a monthly fee that covered illness and medication expenses for its members. This structure operated for decades, but with the arrival of social health insurance, its original purpose lost relevance.
translations.Despu√©s de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, u: After World War II, a new wave of Italian immigration arrived in Miramar, which gave rise on June 29, 1959 to the C√≠rculo Italiano de Miramar, under the presidency of Alberto Caroso. This new institution focused on the social and cultural aspect, organizing meetings, lunches, dinners and various activities for the Italian community.
translations.timelone_1889: April 28 - Foundation of the Italian mutual aid society "Joven Italia" in Miramar, under the presidency of Felice Lucini, to provide medical assistance and medicines to its members.
translations.29 de junio - Formaci√≥n del C√≠rculo It: June 29 - Formation of the C√≠rculo Italiano de Miramar, chaired by Alberto Caroso, in response to the new wave of Italian immigration after World War II. Social gatherings, lunches, dinners and members' birthday celebrations begin.
translations.timelone_2000: Formaci√≥n de una comisi√≥n normalizadora para reactivar la sociedad de socorros mutuos "Joven Italia", que hab√≠a quedado sin socios con la llegada de las obras sociales.
translations.Junio - Inicio de los trabajos de renova: June - Start of renovation work on the old Joven Italia building, with the aim of leaving an important cultural legacy to the city.
translations.timeline_2005: Agosto - Fusi√≥n de ambas instituciones tras una asamblea un√°nime, formando la "Mutual Cultural C√≠rculo Italiano Joven Italia". Octubre - Inauguraci√≥n del Sal√≥n Michelangelo. Se crea una subcomisi√≥n de cultura que comienza a organizar la semana de la cultura anual.
translations.Venta del edificio del C√≠rculo Italiano: Sale of the Italian Circle building and start of construction of a second floor at the Joven Italia headquarters, with new classrooms and an additional hall.
translations.19 de agosto - Inauguraci√≥n del sal√≥n: August 19 - Inauguration of the "Giuseppe Verdi" hall on the second floor, completing an important stage of expansion for the institution.
translations.Celebraci√≥n de los 136 a√±os de histori: Celebration of 136 years of history, reaffirming our commitment to promoting Italian culture in Miramar and continuing with the dreams to be fulfilled that drive our institution.
translations.Un pilar cultural para Miramar a lo larg: A cultural pillar for Miramar over the decades
translations.Hemos establecido un sal√≥n de exposicio: We have established a permanent monthly exhibition hall in our entrance hall, where talented local artists can present their works, and we regularly organize conferences, book presentations and workshops.
translations.Nuestro c√≥ctel de moda anual, que comen: Our annual fashion cocktail, which began as a small event, has become a flagship event of the city, featuring leading figures in the fashion world and raising funds for local institutions in need.
translations.Principios que han guiado nuestra instit: Principles that have guided our institution throughout these 136 years
translations.Fomentamos el sentido de pertenencia y l: We encourage the sense of belonging and unity among the members of the Italian and local community, from our origins as a mutual aid society to today.
translations.Preservamos y promovemos la rica cultura: We preserve and promote the rich Italian culture through exhibitions, talks, and events that enrich the cultural life of Miramar.
translations.Ofrecemos oportunidades de aprendizaje d: We offer learning opportunities of the Italian language and culture for all ages, contributing to the intellectual development of the community.
translations.Construimos puentes entre la cultura ita: We build bridges between Italian and Argentine culture, enriching both communities, as demonstrated by our successful institutional merger in 2005.
translations.Respetamos nuestras ra√≠ces mientras nos: We respect our roots while adapting to new times, as demonstrated by our evolution from a mutual aid society to an integral cultural center.
translations.Apoyamos a nuestra comunidad como lo hic: We support our community as we have done since 1889, now through charitable events such as our annual fashion cocktail that benefits local institutions.
translations.Un vistazo a nuestro pasado en im√°genes: A glimpse into our past in images
translations.\"Una instituci√≥n que vio nacer a una c: "An institution that saw a city born, and a city that saw an institution grow, a pride for all Italians and for all their descendants. A dream that was distant and utopian, but that became a reality from the effort of hundreds of people who dedicated part of their lives to make it a reality. Today it is 136 years and there are many, but we still have dreams to fulfill."
translations.Te acompa√±amos en todo el proceso para: We accompany you throughout the process to obtain your Italian citizenship
translations.Ofrecemos asesoramiento completo para fa: We offer complete advice to facilitate your citizenship process
translations.Te orientamos sobre los requisitos, docu: We guide you on the requirements, necessary documentation and steps to follow to start your procedure.
translations.Te ayudamos con la b√∫squeda, traducci√≥: We help you with the search, translation and legalization of documents necessary for your procedure.
translations.Realizamos el seguimiento de tu tr√°mite: We track your procedure and keep you informed about its status and next steps.
translations.Conoce los pasos para obtener tu ciudada: Learn the steps to obtain your Italian citizenship
translations.Analizamos tu caso para determinar si cu: We analyze your case to determine if you meet the requirements to apply for Italian citizenship by descent.
translations.Te ayudamos a reunir todos los documento: We help you gather all the necessary documents: birth, marriage and death certificates of your Italian ancestors.
translations.Gestionamos la traducci√≥n oficial al it: We manage the official translation into Italian and the legalization of all required documents.
translations.Organizamos toda la documentaci√≥n seg√∫: We organize all the documentation according to the requirements of the corresponding Italian consulate.
translations.Te asesoramos en la presentaci√≥n de la: We advise you on the presentation of the application and monitor it until you obtain your citizenship.
translations.Tener un antepasado italiano que haya em: Have an Italian ancestor who emigrated to Argentina after the unification of Italy (1861).
translations.Demostrar la l√≠nea de descendencia dire: Demonstrate the direct line of descent through official documentation.
translations.El antepasado italiano no debe haber ren: The Italian ancestor must not have renounced his citizenship before the birth of the next descendant in the line.
translations.Presentar partidas de nacimiento, matrim: Submit birth, marriage and death certificates of all ancestors in the line of descent.
translations.Todos los documentos deben estar legaliz: All documents must be legalized and translated into Italian by an official translator.
translations.Resolvemos tus dudas sobre el tr√°mite d: We resolve your doubts about the Italian citizenship process
translations.¬øQui√©nes pueden solicitar la ciudadan√: Who can apply for Italian citizenship?
translations.Cualquier persona que pueda demostrar su: Anyone who can prove their descent from an Italian citizen, without limit of generations, as long as the line of transmission has not been interrupted.
translations.¬øCu√°nto tiempo toma el proceso?: How long does the process take?
translations.El tiempo var√≠a seg√∫n cada caso, pero: The time varies depending on each case, but it can generally take between 1 and 3 years from the submission of the application to obtaining citizenship.
translations.Necesitar√°s partidas de nacimiento, mat: You will need birth, marriage and death certificates of all your ancestors in the Italian line, from your Italian ancestor to you. All must be legalized and translated into Italian.
translations.¬øPuedo tramitar la ciudadan√≠a si mi an: Can I process citizenship if my Italian ancestor became an Argentine citizen?
translations.Depende de cu√°ndo se naturaliz√≥. Si lo: It depends on when he became naturalized. If he did so after the birth of the next descendant in the line, you can still apply for citizenship. If it was before, the line of transmission was interrupted.
translations.¬øQu√© beneficios tiene la ciudadan√≠a i: What are the benefits of Italian citizenship?
translations.La ciudadan√≠a italiana te permite resid: Italian citizenship allows you to reside, work and study in any country of the European Union, travel without restrictions throughout Europe, and transmit citizenship to your descendants.
translations.Cont√°ctanos para una evaluaci√≥n gratui: Contact us for a free evaluation of your case and begin the process towards your Italian citizenship.

translations.Tr√°mites de Ciudadan√≠a Italiana - C√≠r: Italian Citizenship Procedures - C√≠rculo Italiano Joven Italia
translations.Asesoramiento completo para obtener tu c: Complete advice to obtain your Italian citizenship. We help you with document management, translations, legalizations and monitoring of your procedure.
translations.Acompa√±ando a la ciudad de Miramar hace: Accompanying the city of Miramar for 136 years
translations.Las clases con la profesora Gladis son e: Classes with Professor Gladis are excellent. Her teaching method is very clear and dynamic. In a short time I have noticed a great improvement in my English level.
translations.Empec√© desde cero y ahora puedo mantene: I started from scratch and now I can hold basic conversations in English. The atmosphere is very pleasant and the small groups allow for personalized attention.
translations.Mi hijo disfruta mucho las clases de ing: My son really enjoys English classes. Professor Gladis has a very special way of teaching children, making them learn by playing.
translations.Una instituci√≥n que vio nacer a una ciu: An institution that saw a city born, and a city that saw an institution grow, a pride for all Italians and for all their descendants. A dream that was distant and utopian, but that became a reality from the effort of hundreds of people who dedicated part of their lives to make it a reality. Today it is 136 years and there are many, but we still have dreams to fulfill.
translations.19 de agosto - Inauguraci√≥n del sal√≥n: August 19 - Inauguration of the Giuseppe Verdi hall on the second floor, completing an important stage of expansion for the institution.
translations.Desde su formaci√≥n, nuestra subcomisi√≥: Since its formation, our cultural subcommittee has worked professionally in programming annual cultural events such as Culture Week, providing a space where artists, groups and institutions of the city can showcase their talents.
translations.Clases y talleres de danzas latinas para: Latin dance classes and workshops for all ages. Come move and have fun learning rhythms like salsa, bachata and more.

translations.No te pierdas nuestras pr√≥ximas activid: Don't miss our next cultural and social activities.
